title: Ernest Bevin: working-class warrior
itunes:title: Ernest Bevin: working-class warrior
itunes:subtitle: Andrew Adonis discusses his new biography of Ernest Bevin, exploring how he played a crucial role in World War Two and the Cold War. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Author and former cabinet minister Andrew Adonis discusses his new biography of Ernest Bevin, exploring how the Labour politician played a crucial role in both World War Two and the early years of the Cold War. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
